name: Snakenoid Deluxe
description:
In each level the boulders are organized in a different shape.

At the same time the snake has to avoid enemies and may collect bonuses, falling out of the destroyed boulders. The aim of the game is to finish all the levels with the most points. The snake controlled by the player is composed of flexibly connected segments which bounce the ball.

Features

The game is an unique blend of classic game concepts.
Game modes: ARCADE, CHALLENGE, UNLIMITED
Game difficulty: EASY, NORMAL, HARD
